Text: Leak Detection Day of the Week Correction Dates are CorrectPlease note a correction for the above class The brochurewebsite advised the day of the week as Reception Tuesday April Classes Wed April and May Please note the dates are correct but the day of the week is incorrect The Flyer and website should have read Reception Monday April Classes Tuesday April Wednesday May If you have any questions please call me Sorry about any inconvenience this may have caused and we look forward to seeing you at the class Dawn OlsonWallerus Meeting Planner ext Blue Circle Dr Minnetonka MN P F

Leak Detection REGISTER NOW Class Space is LimitedLeak Detection Seminar April May Decatur Illinois Illinois Power Training Center Hampton Inn Forsyth IMPORTANT INFORMATION Class size is limited to people maximum The class is filling up fast The Training is held at Illinois Powers Training Center The class is taught by Ron Six of AEGIS Insurance Services who has over years experience Dont miss this opportunity Hotel Information The cutoff date for the MEA room block is April Hotel rooms are expected to be extremely limited possibly even unavailable after this date Please make your reservations now if you plan to attend the conference You will not only be guaranteed the negotiated rate of youll also be guaranteed a ROOM Forsyth Hampton Inn For more information or to register please visit wwwmidwestenergyorg Questions Please contact Dawn OlsonWallerus Meeting Planner ext Blue Circle Dr Minnetonka MN P F
